title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.4 - Federal jurisdiction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.4 - Federal jurisdiction

State Regulations

Determinations made by the federal SSA affecting
eligibility for federal SSI benefits shall be exclusively subject to SSA
jurisdiction and shall not be hearable by OAH under this Part or Part 358 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-10.4

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
